data.title: Nobel Prize winners - Jews vs Arabs
data.meta_description:
This is not meant as a form of collective bragging or a comparison of which culture is more advanced.
 
What I think this demonstrates is what is important...
data.text:
This is not meant as a form of collective bragging or a comparison of which culture is more advanced.

What I think this demonstrates is what is important to each group or where, and on what each culture chooses to focus their efforts and their passions. For Jews, this is clearly demonstrated below. For Arabs / Muslims, the list suggests that the advancement of man is not one they share with the Jews.

[SIZE=+1]Arab/Islamic Nobel Prize Winners [/SIZE]​

From a pool of 1.4 BILLION Muslims which are 20% of the world's population (2 out of every 10 people)

Literature

1988 - Najib Mahfooz

Peace

1978 - Anwar El-Sadat

1994 - Yasser Arafat *

2003 - Shirin Ebadi

Chemistry

1999 - Ahmed Zewail

Physics

Abdus Salam

* NOTE: Norwegian, Kaare Kristiansen, was a member of the Nobel Committee. He resigned in 1994 to protest the awarding of a Nobel "Peace Prize" to Yasser Arafat, whom he correctly labeled a "terrorist."
